nodes.text: During the Jedi Civil War, archives were located in Garang, Dantooine's capital city. Any crime or business reports were archived, and could later be retrieved by information droids. In 3956 BBY, a report was filed by the municipal authorities about a fight between two colonists named Calder Nettic and Rickard Lusoff. The archive also contained a report that showed Nettic and a man named Handon Guld had rented a speeder together several times. This information was later retrieved by a droid during an investigation into Nettic's death carried out by Jedi Knight Bolook and Revan.
